name: QR Code on Orders
shortdescription: Add a Scan button to every order to instantly view a secure QR code with order details.
longdescription: Easily verify and share order information with a simple scan. This addon adds a Scan button to each order in your list. Clicking it opens a clean, secure QR code popup containing key details like customer name, phone, total, and payment status — all digitally signed to prevent tampering. You can also embed your business logo into the QR code for a professional touch. Perfect for quick verification, customer handover, or offline access.
author: Sclera Games

name: QR Code on Kaata
shortdescription: Generate secure, scannable QR codes for orders — great for delivery or customer verification.
longdescription: Instantly create tamper-proof QR codes for any order with just one click. Designed for real-world use, this addon lets you verify order authenticity on the spot — ideal for delivery staff, warehouse teams, or customer service. The QR code contains essential details like order ID, customer name, phone, total amount, and balance due, all protected with a digital signature. Optionally includes your logo for brand recognition. Fast, secure, and reliable.
author: Sclera Games
